desc.en: The Guangzhou Metro is the rapid transit system of the city of Guangzhou in Guangdong Province of China. It is operated by the state-owned Guangzhou Metro Corporation and was the fourth metro system to be built in mainland China, after those of Beijing, Tianjin, and Shanghai.
desc.zh-Hans: 广州地铁是中国广东省广州市的快速交通系统。它由国有的广州地铁公司运营，是中国大陆继京、津、沪之后的第四个地铁系统。
desc.zh-Hant: 廣州地鐵是中國廣東省廣州市的快速交通系統。它由國有的廣州地鐵公司運營，是中國大陸繼京、津、滬之後的第四個地鐵系統。

updateHistory.reason: Added Line 5 Line 7 Huangpu Tram Line 2 Guangzhou East Ring Intercity Guangzhou Qingyuan Intercity Guangzhou Zhaoqing Intercity and Guangzhou Huizhou Intercity changed the style of the signs and change the Chinese name of Foshan University Xianxi Campus Station
